tournament.name: Fuguete Champ 252 - Play Point P/ Top 10

decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to use the Balustrade Spy's ability to mill cards from the top of the player's library into the graveyard, setting up combos with cards like Exhume and Dread Return to bring back powerful creatures from the graveyard. The deck includes a mix of creatures that benefit from being put into the graveyard and cards that help generate mana to cast those creatures. The goal is to quickly set up powerful board states and overwhelm the opponent with a combination of creatures and spells.

This deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana through land enchantments and mana dorks to play powerful creatures and spells ahead of schedule. By efficiently ramping, the deck can overwhelm opponents with big threats and removal spells while keeping a steady flow of aggression. The Gruul colors provide a mix of creature power and burn spells to maintain board control and pressure the opponent. The deck aims to quickly establish a board presence and maintain pressure throughout the game.

This deck focuses on controlling the board using cheap spells and creatures with abilities that benefit from being flickered or bounced back to the battlefield. By utilizing cards like Sunscape Familiar and God-Pharaoh's Faithful to generate mana advantage, combined with flicker effects like Ghostly Flicker and Snap, the deck can outvalue opponents while countering threats with cards like Prohibit and Foil. The key is to maintain board presence and card advantage while disrupting the opponent's game plan until you can overwhelm them with powerful late-game threats like Mulldrifter and Murmuring Mystic.

The deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana with cards like Utopia Sprawl and Arbor Elf to play big threats like Nyxborn Hydra and Bannerhide Krushok. Writhing Chrysalis and Eldrazi Repurposer provide additional threats while also providing value in different situations. Malevolent Rumble and Ram Through help control the board and clear the way for attacks. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with efficient creatures and removal spells to secure a quick victory.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly and aggressively deal damage to the opponent using low-cost creatures and burn spells. By playing small creatures like Voldaren Epicure and Sneaky Snacker, along with efficient burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart, the deck aims to pressure the opponent's life total early in the game. The inclusion of cards like Guttersnipe and Kessig Flamebreather further enhances the deck's ability to deal damage quickly. With a mix of creature and burn spells, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize.

The deck focuses on quickly dealing damage to the opponent through a combination of creatures with low mana costs and burn spells. The creatures provide consistent damage while the burn spells offer direct damage to finish off the opponent. The deck aims to be fast and aggressive, putting pressure on the opponent early on in the game. It also includes cards that generate additional benefits from casting spells or dealing damage, enhancing the aggressive playstyle of the deck. The high number of burn spells ensures a steady stream of damage to close out the game.

The deck focuses on quickly building a board presence with aggressive creatures and burn spells to deal direct damage to the opponent. It aims to overwhelm the opponent with early threats and removal spells to control the board and finish the game swiftly. The combination of cheap creatures and removal spells allow for quick and efficient damage output, while the lifegain from Alms of the Vein helps to sustain aggression. The deck also includes utility lands like Bojuka Bog and Rakdos Carnarium to further disrupt the opponent's strategies and gain incremental advantages.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with an aggressive strategy utilizing low-cost creatures and burn spells. By quickly building a board presence and dealing direct damage to the opponent, this deck aims to win the game before the opponent has a chance to stabilize. With a mix of haste creatures, direct damage spells, and token generators, this deck is designed to be fast-paced and relentless in its pursuit of victory. The inclusion of Wrenn's Resolve and Rally at the Hornburg further enhances the deck's ability to maintain pressure on the opponent.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with cheap and aggressive artifacts, utilizing cards like Myr Enforcer and Refurbished Familiar to establish a strong board presence. The deck also includes disruption cards like Cast Down and Nihil Spellbomb to control the opponent's resources. The inclusion of Ghostly Flicker allows for additional value by blinking creatures or artifacts with enter the battlefield effects. The mana base is optimized for the deck's colors and artifact synergies, allowing for smooth gameplay and consistent aggression.

The deck focuses on quickly putting pressure on the opponent with low-cost artifacts and creatures, utilizing cards that benefit from having multiple artifacts in play. It also includes cards that can disrupt the opponent's strategy, such as Nihil Spellbomb. The deck's main goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of artifact creatures and burn spells, aiming to win the game quickly before the opponent can set up their own strategy.

This aggressive Mono Black Aggro deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with low-cost creatures and direct damage spells. By utilizing cards like Serrated Scorpion and Okiba Reckoner Raid, the deck puts pressure on the opponent early in the game. Fanatical Offering and Tyrant's Choice provide additional removal options, while cards like Alms of the Vein and Vampire's Kiss help gain life back. The deck focuses on maintaining a fast-paced tempo and finishing off the opponent quickly with cards like Bump in the Night and Sovereign's Bite, ultimately aiming to win through aggressive plays and efficient damage output.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures like Delver of Secrets, Cryptic Serpent, and Tolarian Terror while controlling the board with counterspells like Dispel and Counterspell. Card draw and selection spells such as Brainstorm, Mental Note, and Ponder help maintain consistency and card advantage. In addition, disruptive spells like Deem Inferior and Sleep of the Dead can slow down the opponent's game plan. The deck aims to apply pressure early on and maintain control throughout the game using a mono blue strategy.

The main idea of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy focused on dealing direct damage and quickly building up a board presence. With a combination of low-cost creatures like Goblin Bushwhacker and Voldaren Epicure, along with burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Blast, the goal is to deal damage quickly and efficiently. By utilizing cards like Clockwork Percussionist and Experimental Synthesizer to generate extra value, this deck aims to maintain pressure on the opponent and finish the game swiftly.

The deck focuses on aggressive creatures and burn spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent. Using cheap creatures like Goblin Bushwhacker and Burning-Tree Emissary, as well as direct damage spells like Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Blast, the goal is to overwhelm the opponent before they can set up their own strategy. The deck also includes cards like Clockwork Percussionist and Experimental Synthesizer to provide additional creature buffs and potential card draw. The overall strategy is to quickly deal damage and finish off the opponent with powerful burn spells like Fireblast and Chain Lightning.

This deck is focused on overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells in order to quickly deplete their life total. By utilizing cards like Goblin Bushwhacker, Goblin Tomb Raider, and Burning-Tree Emissary, the deck aims to establish a fast and powerful board presence. The burn spells, such as Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Blast, provide additional reach to finish off opponents or remove threats. With a low mana curve and efficient creatures, the deck looks to consistently apply pressure and close out games before the opponent can stabilize.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game by utilizing the Urzatron lands to generate a large amount of mana. This mana can be used to cast powerful spells and creatures, such as Fangren Marauder and Pactdoll Terror, while also fueling abilities like Golem Foundry and Ashnod's Altar. The deck includes various card draw and mana fixing options to ensure consistency and efficiency. By establishing a strong board presence and resource advantage, the deck aims to outvalue and outlast opponents in a 1 vs 1 Pauper format.
